member.name: M:Users.API.Read.Controllers.v1.UsersController.Get(Users.API.Models.Request.v1.GetUserRequest)
member.summary: Get a single user by their unique identifier
member.param: The unique identifier for the user
member.response: Success - OK - Returns the requested user
Success - No Content - No user matched the given identifier
Error - Bad Request - It was not possible to bind the request JSON
Error - Unprocessable Entity - The GetUserRequest object contained invalid data

member.name: M:Users.API.Read.Controllers.v1.UsersController.Head(Users.API.Models.Request.v1.GetUserRequest)
member.summary: Gets the content length of a user
member.param: A GetUserRequest object which contains fields for paging, searching, filtering, sorting and shaping user data
member.returns: The content length of a page of users
member.response: Success - OK - Returns the requested page of users
Success - No Content - No users matched given criteria
Error - Bad Request - It was not possible to bind the request JSON
